levels.title: Prologue â€” Puddinâ€™ Tease

levels.title: Final â€” Puddin' Trouble (Boss)

global_hint_policy.unlock_conditions: Hints unlock after two wrong attempts or by spending a 'side-challenge' token (earn tokens by completing optional micro-tasks).
global_hint_policy.hint_style: Hints are formed from actual supportive/funny lines in the chat and are presented in-character (Harley sweet / Joker taunt). Example hint snippet: 'effort is my love language' used as a gentle nudge.
